intro: Anthurium pallens, commonly known as the white anthurium, is a tropical plant native to the rainforests of Central and South America. It is characterized by its striking, heart-shaped leaves that are typically dark green with a glossy texture. The plant produces vibrant, spadix-shaped inflorescences surrounded by a showy spathe, which can range in color from white to pink. Anthurium pallens thrives in high humidity and indirect light, making it a popular choice for indoor gardening. Its unique foliage and dramatic flowers make it a visually appealing addition to both indoor and outdoor spaces.
